tool_description: Creates structured content outlines with hierarchical sections, key points, and suggested word counts for writing projects.

topic.description: Main topic for the content outline

content_angle.description: Specific angle or perspective for the content

content_length.description: Target content length: short, medium, long, comprehensive

key_points_per_section.description: Number of key points per main section (1-10)

error_messages: Invalid content length: Use one of [short, medium, long, comprehensive]
Invalid outline depth: Must be integer between 2-5
Invalid key points count: Must be integer between 1-10
Empty topic: Provide a specific topic for the outline
Empty content angle: Specify the content angle or perspective
Empty target audience: Define the target audience for the content
usage: Specify topic, content_angle, and target_audience, optionally configure content_length, outline_depth, and other structural preferences. Returns detailed hierarchical outline.

outline_title.description: Generated title for the content piece

section_descriptions.description: Brief descriptions of what each section should cover

key_points.description: Key points for each section, separated by section breaks

suggested_word_counts.description: Suggested word counts for each main section

total_estimated_words.description: Total estimated word count for the complete content
